DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the investigators' study was to evaluate whether misoprostol will improve pain scores .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between 2 Doses of Misoprostol Before Intrauterine Device
DOC.detailed_description: an intrauterine device can cause pain and discomfort in several ways: Use of the tenaculum to grasp the cervix and straighten the uterus for proper insertion; trans-cervical actions including measuring uterine depth, inserting the intrauterine device insertion tube, and removing the tube; and placement of the device in the uterus.
DOC.criteria: â€¢ Women not taken analgesics or anxiolytics in the 24 hours prior insertion Women who will accept to participate in the study Any contraindication to IUD placement
